qrList.label: Swipes - Set Seeds
qrList.title: Set your own seeds to use with Testing.
qrList.message:
/if left="{{getglobalvar::ms_test_seeds}}" right="test" rule=eq else={:
	/re-replace find=/[^0-9,]/gi replace="{{noop}}" "{{getglobalvar::ms_test_seeds}}" |
	/input default="{{pipe}}" Set seeds to use numbers (0-9) and commas (,) only. DO NOT USE SPACES. |
:}
{:
	/input default="42,1337,69420" Set seeds to use numbers (0-9) and commas (,) only. DO NOT USE SPACES. |
:}|
/let seed_input {{pipe}} |


/if left="{{var::seed_input}}" right="" rule=eq else={:
	/re-replace find=/[^0-9,]/gi replace="{{noop}}" {{var::seed_input}} |
	
	/setglobalvar key=ms_test_seeds [{{pipe}}] |
:}
{:
	/if left="{{getglobalvar::ms_test_seeds}}" right="" rule=eq else={:
		/popup okButton="Yes" cancelButton="No" result=true Do you want to delete the currently set seeds and switch to using default seeds? |
		
		/if left="{{pipe}}" right="1" rule=neq else={:
			/flushglobalvar ms_test_seeds |
		:}
		{:
			/abort quiet=false QR canceled. Aborting. |
		:}|
	:}
	{:
		/abort quiet=false QR canceled. Aborting. |
	:}|
:}|

qrList.label: Swipes - Testing
qrList.title: Test sampler settings or prompts with specific seeds.
qrList.message:
/if left="{{getglobalvar::ms_test_seeds}}" right="" rule=eq else={:
	/pass true |
:}
{:
	/pass false |
:} |

/let use_custom {{pipe}} |


/if left="{{var::use_custom}}" right="true" rule=eq else={:
	/let test_seeds [42,1337,69420] |
	
	/foreach list={{var::test_seeds}} {:
		/dom action=value value={{item}} #seed_textgenerationwebui |
		/wait 3000 |
		
		/swipes-swipe |
	:} ||
	
	/dom action=value value=-1 #seed_textgenerationwebui |
:}
{:
	/foreach globalvar=ms_test_seeds {:
		/dom action=value value={{item}} #seed_textgenerationwebui |
		/wait 3000 |
		
		/swipes-swipe |
	:} ||
	
	/dom action=value value=-1 #seed_textgenerationwebui |
:} |

qrList.label: Swipes - Count
qrList.title: Set the amount of times Multi Swipe will swipe up to a max of 10.

qrList.label: Swipes - Multi
qrList.title: Trigger multiple swipes up to 3 or the amount Count is set to.
